conbody.p: This part prescribes policies, standards, and procedures pertaining to prospective contractorsâ€™ responsibility; debarment, suspension, and ineligibility; qualified products; first article testing and approval; contractor team arrangements; defense production pools and research and development pools; and organizational conflicts of interest.
